notification.fetchErrorMessage: S'ha produït un error en obtenir dades.

alert.textSetup: Heu de completar la configuració del vostre compte de Google per sincronitzar els productes.
alert.textGoogleAnalytics: Google Analytics no s'ha habilitat per a aquest canal de vendes o l'ID de seguiment encara no s'ha definit. Tots dos són necessaris per reclamar l'URL a través del procés de configuració. Vostè pot canviar això en el seu
alert.productSyncInfo: Els vostres productes apareixeran en els llistats de productes gratuïts a la pestanya de compres tan aviat com s'aprovin els productes. Podeu trobar més informació aquí

generalInformation.title: Informació general
generalInformation.mainMenuItemGeneral: Canal de vendes de Google Shopping
generalInformation.descriptionTextModule: Gestionar el canal de vendes de Google Shopping
generalInformation.checkoutTitle: Assigna un aparador designat per realitzar el procés de compra.
generalInformation.checkoutSubtitle: Tots els canals de venda requereixen un aparador associat per completar el procés de compra.
generalInformation.productSubtitle: Aquest grup dinàmic de productes s'utilitza per sincronitzar productes amb Google.

connect.title: Connecteu el vostre compte de Google per utilitzar programes de Google
connect.subTitle: Un compte de Google us permet accedir al Centre de Merchant de Google i als comptes de Google Ads.

disconnect.textIssue: El teu compte ha estat suspès, has de solucionar aquest problema perquè els teus productes apareguin a Google.
disconnect.textDisclaimer: Beginning August 2, 2021, all new merchants will be required to provide their business address and phone number on creation of their Merchant Center account, as well as for any existing accounts that require a review. This private contact information can be entered manually in the
disconnect.titleProfile: Aquest compte de Google es pot utilitzar per accedir al vostre compte de Google Merchant Center a
disconnect.titleMerchant: Un compte suspès de Google Merchant Center no pot publicar anuncis de compres.
disconnect.titleWebsite: El seu lloc web està associat amb el seu compte de Google Merchant Center. S'ha de reclamar que publiqui anuncis de compres.
disconnect.titleMerchantLink: Obteniu més informació sobre les suspensions del compte.
disconnect.textNoAccountConnected: No hi ha cap compte connectat

disconnectModal.title: Desconnecta el compte de Google
disconnectModal.description: Estàs segur que vols desconnectar el teu compte de Google? Si desconnecteu el vostre compte de Google, el Centre de Merchant de Google i els comptes de Google Ads també es desconnectaran.

connect.titleGetStarted: Comenceu amb els programes de Google
connect.textGetStartedDescription: Les solucions minoristes de Google us poden ajudar a donar la benvinguda a més clients al vostre lloc o a la vostra botiga. Un cop hàgiu configurat, tindreu accés als informes perquè pugueu veure el bé que estan fent els vostres anuncis.
connect.textEuropeanAreaDescription: Si ets a l'Espai Econòmic Europeu o Suïssa, el teu compte del Centre de Comerciants ha d'estar associat a un Servei de Compres Comparativa (CSS). Trobareu més informació a
connect.textDefaultCSSDescription: Si creeu un nou compte de Comerciant Center a través d'aquesta aplicació, s'associarà amb Google Shopping, CSS de Google, per defecte. Pots canviar el CSS associat al teu compte en qualsevol moment. Trobeu més informació sobre els nostres Partners CSS
connect.textAfterSetupDescription: Un cop hàgiu configurat el vostre compte de Centre de Comerciants, podeu utilitzar la nostra eina d'onboarding independentment de quin CSS utilitzeu.
connect.titleConnectGoogleAccount: Connecteu el vostre compte de Google per utilitzar programes de Google
connect.textConnectGoogleAccountDescription: Un compte de Google us permet accedir al Centre de Merchant de Google i als comptes de Google Ads.
connect.messageErrorGoogleAuth: Missatge d'error rebut del servei de Google: {error}

disconnect.textDisconnectInfo: Si desconnecteu el vostre compte de Google, el Centre de Merchant de Google i els comptes de Google Ads també es desconnectaran.

selectMerchant.titleGeneral: Crear o connectar el compte de Google Merchant Center
selectMerchant.titleConnectExistingMerchant: Connectar un compte existent de Google Merchant Center
selectMerchant.textNoExistingMerchantDescription: Encara no hi ha comptes de Merchant Center vinculats al vostre Compte de Google. Si us plau, creeu primer un compte del Centre de Comerciants.
selectMerchant.textConnectExistingMerchantDescription: ja té accés a un o més comptes de Google Merchant Center. Podeu utilitzar un dels comptes ja existents de Google Merchant Center o crear-ne un de nou.
selectMerchant.placeholderSelectMerchant: Seleccioneu un compte existent de Google Merchant Center...
selectMerchant.titleCreateMerchant: Crear un compte nou de Google Merchant Center
selectMerchant.textCreateMerchantDescription: Si voleu començar fresc amb un nou compte de Google Merchant Center, creeu-lo aquí.
selectMerchant.buttonCreateMerchant: Crear un compte nou Centre de Comerciants

createMerchant.titleCreateMerchant: Crea el teu compte de Merchant Center
createMerchant.textCreateMerchantInfo: Aquest procés triga uns minuts a completar-se. Si us plau, poseu-vos al costat i no tanqueu aquesta finestra emergent. És possible que triguin altres 5-10 minuts abans que el vostre compte nou sigui visible a Shopware i al Centre de Merchant de Google.
createMerchant.tooltipsWebsite: Aquest és el lloc web utilitzat per crear el seu compte de Centre de Comerciants.
createMerchant.placeholderStoreName: Introduïu el nom de la botiga...
createMerchant.tooltipsStoreName: Aquest nom apareixerà als anuncis de Shopping.
createMerchant.helptextBusinessPhoneNumber: Google will use this number to verify you’re the owner of the business. It will not be displayed to customers.
createMerchant.helptextBusinessLocality: City, town or commune. May also include dependent localities or sublocalities (e.g. neighborhoods or suburbs).
createMerchant.helptextBusinessRegion: Top-level administrative subdivision of the country. For example, a state like California ("CA") or a province like Quebec ("QC").

verify.titleGeneral: To use Shopping ads, your shop must meet these requirements:
verify.textSecureCheckoutProcess: Secure checkout process and collection of personal data
verify.tooltipVerifyDescription: Verification lets Google know you are the authorized owner of your website.
verify.tooltipClaimDescription: Claiming associates your website URL with your Google Merchant Center account.

termsService.titleTerms: Terms of service for Google Programs
termsService.titleTermsDescription: By purchasing Shopping ads, I agree to comply with Google's terms and policies, including:
termsService.textMerchantTerms: Google's Merchant Center terms of service
termsService.labelAcceptTerms: I have read and accept these terms.

shipping.textSettingDescription: To show ads to a particular country or region, you must offer shipping and set up shipping costs for that area. Your Merchant Center shipping costs must match the costs you charge on your website.
shipping.textFlatRateOption: Use a flat rate for all orders
shipping.textSelfSetupOption: Don’t sync settings from Shopware. I’ll set this up myself in Google Merchant Center

finish.textDoneDescription: Your Google Merchant account is now linked to this Sales Channel.

productSync.title: Product synchronisation
productSync.textManualSyncProductsDescription: Manually trigger the synchronisation with Google Merchant Center by clicking the button below.
productSync.textEnableAutomaticSync: Automatic synchronisation will be available once a manual one has been completed.
productSync.textAutomaticSyncDescription: Products will automatically be synced with the Google Merchant Center in intervals set below.
productSync.resynchronisingConfirmText: Product synchronisation is already in progress! Are you sure you want start the synchronisation anew?
productSync.disabled: Product synchronisation not possible. Make sure your assigned storefront sales channel is active and not in maintenance mode.

syncStatus.progress: The uploaded product feed is being processed. ({localDate})
syncStatus.failure: Errors encountered while synchronising your products.
syncStatus.none: You haven't synchronized any products yet.
syncStatus.error: An error occurred please try again.

categoryMapping.title: Category mapping
categoryMapping.emptyCategories: Select a store category and assign it to a Google product category.
categoryMapping.textGoogleProductCategoryDescription: Google-defined product category for your product. Required for Apparel & Accessories (166), Media (783) and Software (2092).
categoryMapping.messageSetCategoryMappingError: An error occurred while saving the category mapping

modalTransferAssignment.title: Transfer assignment to all subcategories
modalTransferAssignment.textTransferDescription: You are going to transfer the assignment of "{categoryName}" to all subcategories.
modalTransferAssignment.textOverwriteWarning: This will overwrite all existing assignments to subcategories.

adsAccount.title: Account
adsAccount.messageFetchAdsListError: An error occurred while fetching list ads account.
adsAccount.messageFetchAdsInfoError: An error occurred while fetching ads account info.
adsAccount.messageCreateAdsAccountError: An error occurred while creating ads account info.
adsAccount.subTitle: Your Google Ads account allows you to create Google Smart Campaigns for products in your Google Merchant Center account. Any campaigns created here will also appear in your Google Ads account and you will be billed directly through Google.

connect.title: Connect your Google Ads account
connect.textSelectAccountPlaceholder: Select an existing Google Ads account
connect.noExistingAccountAlert: There are no existing Google Ads accounts linked to {accountEmail}. You need to create a new Google Ads account.

disconnect.title: Google Ads account
disconnect.error: An error occurred while disconnecting the Google Ads account.

billingInformation.titleAccountSetting: To be able to create campaigns you will first have to
billingInformation.acceptInvitationStep: Accept the Google Ads Account invite sent to
billingInformation.acceptInvitationNote: If the invitation has been accepted, this checklist will be updated within 2 minutes.
billingInformation.addedBillingStep: Add billing information for Google Ads
billingInformation.addBillingModalDescription: Any campaigns created here will appear in your Google Ads account. You will be billed directly through Google. To ensure your products appear across Google,
billingInformation.billingInformationSetting: add billing information in your Google Ads account settings.

campaigns.title: Campaigns
campaigns.emptyDescription:
You haven't created any campaigns yet.
Create your first campaign to promote your products.
campaigns.textDeleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete the campaign "{name}"?
campaigns.tooltipInputDailyCampaignBudget: Only pay if someone clicks your ad. Recommended minimum budget of {amount} per day.
campaigns.textProductPartitionFilters: Select products using product partition filters
campaigns.textCampaignDurationDescription: Your campaign will run until you pause it. You can pause your campaign at any time, however it can take up to 30 days for Google to optimize your products and ads.
campaigns.textScheduleDescription: If your campaign is set to active, it will start and end at the specified times.

reports.title: Reports
reports.emptyDescription: There are no reports available yet. It may take a while until the reports of your current campaigns appear here.
